about.bioText: I am a passionate developer with a focus on building modern, responsive, and user-friendly web applications. With a strong background in both frontend and backend technologies, I enjoy solving complex problems and creating efficient solutions.

contact.subtitle: Get in touch for collaborations or just to say hi.

experience.subtitle: My professional journey and career milestones.

item1.description: Key contributor in developing scalable fintech platforms for major subsidiaries like epay and XE. Specialized in building secure, high-performance web applications using Vue.js ecosystem. Led a major technical migration from Vue 2/Vuex to Vue 3/Pinia and JavaScript to TypeScript. Deeply involved in the full SDLC within an Agile environment, utilizing Jira, CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions), and analytics tools (Segment, LogRocket) to ensure code quality and user satisfaction.

xe.description: Built from ground up in a team of highly educated colleagues.
achievements: Mastered Git versioning and GitHub Actions for CI/CD
Built secure, clean code focusing on financial data integrity
Developed in Agile environment using Scrum methodology
Full migration from Vue 2 to Vue 3 and JS to TS
Implemented comprehensive testing with Vitest and Cypress
Optimized performance via lazy loading and code splitting
Managed global localization using vue-i18n and Lokalise
Contributed to project re-architecture and component design patterns

ria.description: Creating scalable modern financial platform for sending money.
achievements: Developed using Vue.js ecosystem with Composition API
Transitioned styling from SCSS to Tailwind CSS
Enforced code quality with ESLint and Prettier
Conducted rigorous code reviews focusing on security and logic

item2.description: Collaborated with various clients to design and develop modern, responsive presentational websites using Vue.js. Managed the entire development lifecycle, from requirement gathering to incremental updates and final deployment, ensuring high client satisfaction and visual appeal.

item1.description: A full-featured online store with cart, checkout, and admin dashboard.

item2.title: Task Management App
item2.description: Collaborative task manager with real-time updates and team features.
